snippet: The two favorites to win the UEFA Champions League, Bayern Munich and Real Madrid, were matched against one another in the semifinals in a draw held Friday in Nyon, Switzerland.
abstract: Bayern Munich and Real Madrid, two favorites to win the UEFA Champions League, will face each other in semifinals following draw.
lead_paragraph: The two favorites to win the UEFA Champions League, Bayern Munich and Real Madrid, were matched against one another in the semifinals in a draw held Friday in Nyon, Switzerland.

headline.main: Bayern Munich and Real Madrid to Meet in Champions League Semis
